docs.text: Reset root password RHEL 7/8 Reboot to grub menu and press e to edit the boot line On the line marked linux at the end enter rd.break Press Ctrl and X to boot into the emergency shell mount -o remount,rw /sysroot chroot /sysroot passwd touch /.autorelabel
